card.name: Xenon Da Vinci, Master of Space

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Giants, Dreammates, or Origins. {SOULSHIFT} (When you summon this creature, this creature's cost is reduced by the base creature's cost. property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put up to 2 Gods from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has "Blocker". ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone have 500 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, all your opponent's tapped creatures don't untap at the start of their next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all cross gear in the battle zone into their owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone that has the lowest power. If there are 2 or more creatures that have the lowest power, you may choose any of them. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a spell that has "shield trigger" from among them. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then cast the chosen spell for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE EVOLUTION BURST} (If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may choose both.) Choose up to 2 of your creatures in the battle zone. Those creatures can't be blocked this turn. At the end of the turn, untap up to 2 of your creatures in thebattle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your creatures that has Cyber in its race. {SOULSHIFT} (When you summon this creature, this creature's cost is reduced by the base creature's cost. However, it can't cost less than 1.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Players can't cast spells that have the same civilization as a spell in their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Hand evolution—Choose a water creature in your hand and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 2 cards that have the same name. Put those 2 cards into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ God Link (Adge, Emperor of the Gods) Right Side (Mani, Emperor of the Gods or Vishu, Emperor of the Gods) Top Side {GOD LINK} (If you have the specified God in the battle zone, you may link it to this card. The linked God has the characteristics of each God (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When it would leave the battle zone, choose either card.) ■ Whenever this creature links with another God, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you would draw a card, you may draw 2 cards instead. If you do, discard a card from your hand. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Your opponent puts the chosen card on the bottom of their deck and draws a card.

You may choose the same creature more than once.
